projects.title: Digital Banking Platform
projects.subtitle: Microservices-based neobank simulation with Kubernetes and CI/CD
projects.shortSummary: A production-style digital banking platform with microservices for authentication, accounts, transactions, fraud detection, and notifications.
projects.longDescription: A neobank-style system where each domain runs as an independent microservice with its own database. Supports onboarding, KYC workflow, account management, transaction handling, fraud flagging, and automated CI/CD pipelines in Kubernetes.
whatIDid: Designed microservice boundaries and database schemas.
Implemented JWT auth and role-based access.
Containerized services and deployed to Kubernetes.
Created CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.
Built customer and admin dashboards.

projects.title: SDG Co-Benefit Intelligence System
projects.subtitle: AI-powered scoring for carbon projects based on SDG co-benefits and risk
projects.shortSummary: A research-driven system that analyzes carbon project documents and external data to score SDG co-benefits, permanence, and risk.
projects.longDescription: An intelligence layer built on top of registries like Verra and Gold Standard. Extracts SDG claims and risk features using NLP/LLM pipelines, integrates external signals, and produces interpretable quality scores for investors.
whatIDid: Defined scoring framework for SDGs and carbon quality.
Built PDF/NLP pipelines with LLM extraction.
Created dashboard for score visualization.
Integrated external risk signals.

whatIDid: Designed multi-tenant architecture.
Implemented document ingestion + embedding pipeline.
Built chatbot management dashboard.
Developed embeddable chat widget.
